resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/compare source and sink files and copy')]

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as ModifiedDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'CustomerTable' as Source,
'CustomerTable CSV File' as Destination,
'@{activity('CopyCustomerTable').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('CopyCustomerTable').output.errors[0].Code}' as ErrorCode,
'@{replace(activity('CopyCustomerTable').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as ErrorDescriprion,
'@{utcNow()}' as ErrorLoggedTime

activities.name: If Condition for schema check before copy

expression.value: @equals(activity('Get Metadata of emp file').output.structure,activity('Get Metadata of empref file').output.structure)
